meanings.definition: The plural form of 'azan', the Islamic call to prayer.
meanings.sent1: Every day, the azans echo through the city, reminding people of the time to pray.
meanings.sent2: The azans from the mosque can be heard across the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The azans decided to have a competition to see who could be the loudest.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the azans painted the sky with their melodious calls.
meanings.sent5: The azans filled the air with a sense of peace and tranquility.

meanings.definition: A verb form meaning to perform the Islamic call to prayer.
meanings.sent1: The imam azans five times a day at the mosque.
meanings.sent2: She azans beautifully, captivating everyone who hears her.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to azans by meowing loudly at the birds outside.
meanings.sent4: His voice azans through the still night, reaching every corner of the village.
meanings.sent5: The muezzin azans with such passion and devotion, it moves all who listen.
